analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0x5e0f3b745cd5a94fca1ed2939d691269e698b4ea.sol:
	Contract GR8Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0x5e0f3b745cd5a94fca1ed2939d691269e698b4ea.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0x5e0f3b745cd5a94fca1ed2939d691269e698b4ea.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/12/0x5e0f3b745cd5a94fca1ed2939d691269e698b4ea.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0x5e0f3b745cd5a94fca1ed2939d691269e698b4ea.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
